product_name: OllyDog Mt. Tam Hands-Free Belt and Dog Leash
long_description: The OllyDog Mt. Tam Hands-Free belt and dog leash is perfect for active dog lovers who like to run hands-free or carry something besides the leash. Elasticized and adjustable belt is 1.5 in. wide for a comfortable fit; daisy chain loops make it easy to attach belt to the leash. Zippered pocket features a key clip and internal mesh pocket with exit port that holds and dispenses waste baggies. Mt. Tam leash features a shock-absorbent, pull-reducing elastic section that stretches up to 15 in. Leash adjusts from 5 to 8 ft.; 9 in. handle sports a reflective strip for visibility in low light.
short_description: The OllyDog Mt. Tam Hands-Free belt and dog leash is perfect for active dog lovers who like to run hands-free or carry something besides the leash.
